text.english: Important Information
text.french: Une information important

text.english: Emergency Contact Name
text.french: Nom à contacter en cas d'urgence

text.english: Emergency Contact Phone
text.french: En cas d'urgence Téléphone

text.english: The Ride uses a yellow flag and stickers to identify cancer survivors. If you are a cancer survivor or are battling cancer at this time and would like to be recognized, please check this box.
text.french: The Ride utilise un cordon et autocollants spécial pour identifier les survivants du cancer . Si vous êtes un survivant du cancer ou luttez cancer à cette époque et que vous souhaitez être reconnu , s'il vous plaît cocher cette case .

text.english: Are you a cancer survivor?
text.french: Êtes-vous un survivant du cancer ?

text.english: If you require a vegetarian meal please check this box. Gluten free options will be available at every meal/snack area.
text.french: Si vous avez besoin d' un repas végétarien s'il vous plaît cocher cette case . sans gluten seront disponibles à chaque / snack- coin repas .

text.english: Do you require a vegetarian meal?
text.french: Avez-vous besoin d'un moyen végétarien?

text.english: How many years have you ridden with The Ride?
text.french: Combien d'années avez-vous monté avec The Ride ?

text.english: Please select your Jersey Size
text.french: S'il vous plaît sélectionnez votre taille Jersey

text.english: XS (chest size 32-34")
text.french: XS (chest size 32-34")

text.english: S (chest size 34-36")
text.french: S (chest size 34-36")

text.english: M (chest size 38-40")
text.french: M (chest size 38-40")

text.english: L (chest size 42-44")
text.french: L (chest size 42-44")

text.english: XL (chest size 46-48")
text.french: XL (chest size 46-48")

text.english: XXL (chest size 50-52")
text.french: XXL (chest size 50-52")

text.english: XXXL
text.french: XXXL

text.english: Friday, June 10th Shuttles from Toronto (Exhibition Place Parking Lot 2) to Niagara Falls Host Hotel - 3:30 p.m. departure
text.french: Friday, June 10th Shuttles from Toronto (Exhibition Place Parking Lot 2) to Niagara Falls Host Hotel - 3:30 p.m. departure

text.english: I would like to book the 3:30 p.m. shuttle
text.french: I would like to book the 3:30 p.m. shuttle

text.english: Friday, June 10th Shuttles from Toronto (Exhibition Place Parking Lot 2) to Niagara Falls Host Hotel - 6:15 p.m. departure
text.french: Friday, June 10th Shuttles from Toronto (Exhibition Place Parking Lot 2) to Niagara Falls Host Hotel - 6:15 p.m. departure

text.english: I would like to book the 6:15 p.m. shuttle
text.french: I would like to book the 6:15 p.m. shuttle

text.english: Saturday Morning Shuttles from Toronto Host Hotel (Intercontinental Hotel) to Opening Ceremonies. Shuttles will run from from 6:00am to 6:45am, fill on a first come, first serve basis and depart when full. Please note: Bike Transport will not be provided with the Saturday morning shuttles.
text.french: Saturday Morning Shuttles from Toronto Host Hotel (Intercontinental Hotel) to Opening Ceremonies. Shuttles will run from from 6:00am to 6:45am, fill on a first come, first serve basis and depart when full. Please note: Bike Transport will not be provided with the Saturday morning shuttles.

text.english: I would like to book the shuttle from the Toronto Host Hotel to the Toronto Opening Ceremonies Site
text.french: I would like to book the shuttle from the Toronto Host Hotel to the Toronto Opening Ceremonies Site

text.english: Saturday Morning Shuttles from Niagara Host Hotel (Sheraton Falls View Hotel) to Opening Ceremonies. Shuttles will run from from 6:00am to 6:45am, fill on a first come, first serve basis and depart when full. Please note: Bike Transport will not be provided with the Saturday morning shuttles.
text.french: Saturday Morning Shuttles from NIagara Host Hotel (Sheraton Falls View Hotel) to Opening Ceremonies. Shuttles will run from from 6:00am to 6:45am, fill on a first come, first serve basis and depart when full. Please note: Bike Transport will not be provided with the Saturday morning shuttles.

text.english: I would like to book the shuttle from the Niagara Host Hotel to the Niagara Opening Ceremonies Site
text.french: I would like to book the shuttle from the Niagara Host Hotel to the Niagara Opening Ceremonies Site

text.english: Niagara Finish Line to Toronto Ride Venue Shuttle. To ensure your bike returns to Toronto with you the Ride offers a complimentary Bike Transport as well if needed.
text.french: Niagara Finish Line to Toronto Ride Venue Shuttle. To ensure your bike returns to Toronto with you the Ride offers a complimentary Bike Transport as well if needed.

text.english: I would like to book the shuttle from the Niagara Finish Line back to Toronto
text.french: I would like to book the shuttle from the Niagara Finish Line back to Toronto

text.english: The Ride will provide complimentary Bike Transport on a separate truck to the Niagara Falls site. All bikes will be secured overnight with 24 hour security.
text.french: The Ride will provide complimentary Bike Transport on a separate truck to the Niagara Falls site. All bikes will be secured overnight with 24 hour security.

text.english: I would like to book bike transport
text.french: I would like to book bike transport
